org.dotplot.core
Class ContextFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.core.ContextFactory

public class ContextFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles the creation of the DotplotContext of the system.

Before invoking getContext() it is possible to change some context parametes, like the plugin directory, the working dirextory and the schema file. After invokin getContext() the DotplotContext will be created and persistent in the ContextFactory for runntime.

Author:
Christian Gerhardt
See Also:
DotplotContext, CoreSystem, StartUpJob, PluginLoadingJob

Method Detail

getContext

public static DotplotContext getContext()
Returns the stored DotplotContext.

If the context isn't created yet, the context will be created at that point.

Returns:
The DotplotContext.

setPluginDirectory

public static void setPluginDirectory(java.lang.String directory)

Parameters:
directory - Path of the plugin directory.

setShemaFile

public static void setShemaFile(java.lang.String schemaFile)
Sets the schema file.

Parameters:
schemaFile - Path of the shema file.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if shemaFile is null.

createContext

private static DotplotContext createContext()
Creates a DotplotContext.

The DotplotContext will be created and the CoreSystem plugin installed. After that, the PluginLoadingJob and the StartUpJob are executed.

Returns:
The DotplotContext.
See Also:
CoreSystem, StartUpJob, PluginLoadingJob
